run_test_cases module¶

class run_test_cases.RunTests[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to run test cases to evaluate JFORTES tool. In this first moment we are evaluating only the translation of the properties generated by ESC/JAVA to JFORTES format.

load_dir_and_run_recursive(_pathdir)[source]¶

Load all tests cases (java programs) available in a directory given as input. And then, run the jfortes to perform the translation of the properties.

Parameters:_pathdir (str) – directory path with java files to be tested
run_test_in_jfortes(_pathjavafile)[source]¶

Run the the test case with jfortes. In this moment only is executed the translation. This way in the execution is given as input to JFORTES the option -t.

Parameters:_pathjavafile (str) – path of the java file to be tested.
Returns:It is print the result in the screen in the csv format
